prompt_base: muscular saiyan warrior, fierce intense blue eyes, short rigid spiky dark blue hair, powerful physique, confident expression, 8k cinematic photo, dramatic lighting
feature_prompt: hyperdetailed skin texture, individual hair strands, highly reflective metallic texture on segmented battle armor, subtle weathering on face, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth armor, toy, doll, bright yellow hair, flat lighting, low quality, (long hair:1.1), (human face:1.2)
